---
title: "Resources"
---

The following resources are available for training and testing. Please download and save copies to your computer as needed.

-   Training Script R file: [link](https://github.com/massbays-tech/intro-to-r/data/MassWateR_Training_script.R)
-   Training Script txt file: [link](https://github.com/massbays-tech/intro-to-r/data/MassWateR_Training_script.txt)
-   **Sample Surface water quality results**: [link](https://github.com/massbays-tech/intro-to-r/data/Training_Results.xlsx)
-   **Sample Data quality objectives for accuracy**: [link](https://github.com/massbays-tech/intro-to-r/data/Training_DQOAccuracy.xlsx)
-   **Sample Data quality objectives for frequency and completeness**: [link](https://github.com/massbays-tech/intro-to-r/data/Training_DQOFreqComp.xlsx)
-   **Sample Site metadata**: [link](https://github.com/massbays-tech/intro-to-r/data/Training_Sites.xlsx)
-   **Sample WQX metadata**: [link](https://github.com/massbays-tech/intro-to-r/data/Training_WQXMeta.xlsx)
-   Parameter mapping: [link](https://github.com/massbays-tech/MassWateR/raw/main/inst/extdata/ParameterMapping.xlsx)
-   Parameter thresholds: [link](https://github.com/massbays-tech/MassWateR/raw/main/inst/extdata/ThresholdMapping.xlsx)
-   Intro to MassWateR slide deck: [link](https://massbays-tech.github.io/intro-to-r){target="_blank"} (visit the [official website](https://massbays-tech.github.io/MassWateR) for detailed info)
